wikipedia_page.main: Sir Derek William Bowett,  (20 April 1927 – 23 May 2009) was an international lawyer and academic. He was appointed Whewell Professor of International Law in 1981 and was President of Queens' College, Cambridge 1970–1982.

response: *Sir Derek Bowett, 82, British academic lawyer, President of Queens' College, Cambridge (1970–1982).Sir Derek Bowett
